info.name: EASB - ASB Komponen Bangunan Std Module API
info.description: API collection for ASB Komponen Bangunan Std Module - managing ASB Komponen Bangunan Standard data.

item.name: ASB Komponen Bangunan Std Management (SUPERADMIN Only)

request.description:
Create a new ASB Komponen Bangunan Std entry. Requires SUPERADMIN role.

**Fields:**
- `komponen` (string, required): Komponen bangunan name/description
- `files` (enum, required): File type - must be either 'ORIGIN' or 'REVIEW'
- `idAsbJenis` (number, required): ID of the related ASB Jenis
- `idAsbTipeBangunan` (number, required): ID of the related ASB Tipe Bangunan

Update an existing ASB Komponen Bangunan Std. Requires SUPERADMIN role.

**Fields:**
- `id` (number, required): ID of the ASB Komponen Bangunan Std to update
- `komponen` (string, optional): Komponen bangunan name/description
- `files` (enum, optional): File type - must be either 'ORIGIN' or 'REVIEW'
- `idAsbJenis` (number, optional): ID of the related ASB Jenis
- `idAsbTipeBangunan` (number, optional): ID of the related ASB Tipe Bangunan

Delete an ASB Komponen Bangunan Std entry. Requires SUPERADMIN role.

**Fields:**
- `id` (number, required): ID of the ASB Komponen Bangunan Std to delete

item.description: Management operations for ASB Komponen Bangunan Std

item.name: ASB Komponen Bangunan Std Queries

request.description:
Get paginated list of ASB Komponen Bangunan Std entries.

**Request Body:**
- `page` (number, required): Page number (minimum 1)
- `amount` (number, required): Items per page (minimum 1)

item.name: Get ASB Komponen Bangunan Std Detail

request.description:
Get detailed information for a specific ASB Komponen Bangunan Std entry.

**Request Body:**
- `id` (number, required): ID of the ASB Komponen Bangunan Std (minimum 1)

item.description: Query endpoints for retrieving ASB Komponen Bangunan Std information
